item.title: How to Create and Deliver a Technical Talk as a Software Developer
item.description: Everyone says delivering a technical talk is a great opportunity to connect with people, build your reputation, create opportunities to grow your career. Here at hexdevs, we even recommend people to just don’t go to meetups… but to talk at meetups! When you finally decide to do it, the fear of tackling public speaking pops up. Is public speaking a required skill for a Software Engineer? What are you even going to talk about it?
